# PKIssuerProvisioningExtensionAuthorizationResult.authorized

**Case**

A result that indicates the user successfully authorized adding the payment pass.

## Declaration

```swift
case authorized
```

## Authorization results

- **PKIssuerProvisioningExtensionAuthorizationResult.canceled**: A result that indicates the user canceled authorization or wasn’t authorized to add the payment card.

items.description: A result that indicates the user canceled authorization or wasn’t authorized to add the payment card.
items.name: PKIssuerProvisioningExtensionAuthorizationResult.canceled
